title: Ep. 243: How to Improve Cultural Competence in Dermatology and Skincare with Dr. Susan Taylor
itunes:title: Ep. 243: How to Improve Cultural Competence in Dermatology and Skincare with Dr. Susan Taylor
itunes:subtitle: Dermatologist Susan Taylor, MD, the founder of the Skin of Color Society, is here to talk about structural racism and unconscious bias in medicine, colorism in skincare marketing, whether or not different skin tones need different products, and how she...
description:
Dermatologist Susan Taylor, MD, the founder of the Skin of Color Society, is here to talk about structural racism and unconscious bias in medicine, colorism in skincare marketing, whether or not different skin tones need different products, and how she and her colleagues are working to improve dermatology education and, ultimately, patient care. -- Want more of our beauty podcast? Episode Recaps & Notes: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
